column1: Baby Barnaby's////This place is generally really good
column2: especially for breakfast or brunch on the weekends. Their corned beef hash is right out of New York and their orange juice has Tallahasseeans writing home to ma and pa. That being said
column3: while the staff are friendly and well-meaning
column4: they often become overwhelmed by the volume of orders. The last time I was there
column6: our waiter forgot our orders and came back to retake them almost 40 minutes later. When the food did come
column7: the eggs were cold. In general this is a great place for a local breakfast
column8: but if you are pressed for time or generally impatient
column9: you might want to opt for something slightly more consistent.
